name: The Spider Protocol
description:
Enter the Matrix and find the Protocol Capsule

( A Dungeon Crawler in 3 Dimensions with a Hacking Theme )

Use W,A and D to navigate through cyberspace. Find the Spider Capsule to reset and destabilize the Network.

Made for the January Berlin Mini Jam - the theme was Walking on Walls

"Matrix" Texture by Jojo-ojoj

Based on the Procedueral Pathfinding Network System of Fractal Forest
